review:
I was very anxious while going for extraction. So many wiered thoughts of pain that I may experience  but the entire process went pretty smooth. Dr. Ritesh made it so simple and easy that I was quite surprised that my two teeth were out just in mere 10 min's I guess. I appreciate his patience while injecting painkiller as it's almost a nightmare for me. His calm nature and friendly gesture made the experience worth appreciating. 
I highly recommend Dr. Ritesh to anyone who is suffering from dental problem

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very nice doctor.  Talks to patients  very politely.  When he extracts  the tooth  you will not feel that tooth  has been removed. So carefully  he does without the patient  feeling the pain.  I will definitely  recommend him to people when they approach me.

My father and I visited for tooth extraction. Doctor removed the tooth in merely 5 mins. Humble and professional. There was no pain, just had to take one pain killer after extraction. Explained all post extraction dos and don'ts. Also the next day they call to check if the patient is fine or not. Impressive! No over charges for extraction. Very satisfied. Strongly recommend Dr. Ritesh and identist clinic as all specialists are available at the same place with nominal charges.

Very friendly he makes u comfortable and does his work efficiently 
He tells us about our problem and makes u feel relaxed

I have visited "I dentist " clinic which is located near Kondapur. Dr Ritesh Rajan had removed wisdom teeth almost 2 weeks ago. *** ****** **** ** **** ******* *** *** ***** *** **********please dnt go to I dentist clinic. There you will consult Dr Abhilash Raavi and after that treatment will be done by Ritesh Rajan and his way of treatment is very harsh
He has all the patience. He explained me the process along with do's and dont's. It was a very smooth process. I am sure this happened due to his experience and patience he shows towards a Patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very cool. he explains the issue patiently and counsels the need for change in your life style. I made some important decisions based on his counseling to improve my oral health.
I recommend the doctor happy to come back again if any issue.... And I will recommend my friends and relatives to visit I dentist for any kind of dental problems....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: Well communicated procedure . With minimal pain and breakage . Post procedure instructions were clear. All questions answered . Hygienic and clean facilities . Very good experience.

review:
Both doctors Mr.Raja Shekar and Mr.Ritesh are cool and environment is friendly.

Treatment is done with most experienced hands and I feel comfortable during my surgical tooth extraction.

I highly recommend personally to visit Hyderabad Laser Dentistry for all your dental problems. You will find good and valuable solutions for all dental related queries.

The Dr was very patient and co operating
With the patient.he has done the treatment to the entire satisfaction of me even though my problem of pain and suffering was there.
A very nice and young prospective Dr.I wish him a bright future and good health to serve the public.
R SAIRAM
9581241040
Doctor was good and informative about the problem and was constantly communicating during extraction which helps a lot
Dr.Abilash was good and polite to explain the cause and remidy. Dr.Ritesh made sure that the tooth extraction was smooth and easy.

Very experienced doctor. Helpful staff. All my wisdom teeth extractions were done here. Apart from having impacted wisdom teeth, the staff made me feel very comfortable n extracted the teeth successfully. Would recommend 100%.
Highly qualified nd experienced doctors with courteous staffs makes the procedure easy in this dental clinic.

Overall experience was great. The process went very smooth. Doctors are very good. I didn't realised when the whole thing got finished. No pain during the process. My experience with Dr Ritesh was excellent. Appreciate his work.
Dr.Ritesh is an excellent surgeon. Got my wisdom tooth removed at ease. One of the best doctors I know, would definitely recommend him
